explanation: [0-0] In a room with a colorful slide, a cartoon Spider-Man is standing at the top of the green slide, looking forward. The slide's poles are red, and the stairs are yellow. The floor is gray marble, and a white skull painting hangs on the wall.

[0-2] As the cartoon Spider-Man starts to slide down, the camera moves to the right, revealing Captain America's shield on the wall. As the cartoon Spider-Man gets off the slide and stands on the floor, the cartoon Hulk stands beside him.

[0-2] As the cartoon Spider-Man starts to slide down, the camera moves to the right, revealing Captain America's shield on the wall. As the cartoon Spider-Man gets off the slide and stands on the floor, the cartoon Hulk stands beside him.

[2-5] Then, the camera moves left, and the scene changes. A chibi-style cartoon Spider-Man is now standing at the top of the slide. As the chibi Spider-Man slides down, Captain America's shield appears on the wall again. When the chibi Spider-Man reaches the bottom of the green slide, he falls in front of the cartoon Hulk. The camera then moves left, showing a cartoon Spider-Man standing at the top of the green slide, looking down.
